m:MaterialPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<!-- Addin Import -->
xmlns:ma="urn:import:gwt.material.design.addins.client"
<!-- Addin Usage -->
<ma:timepicker.MaterialTimePicker ui:field="tp" placeholder="Snooze Time" />

m:MaterialTitle.title: Time Picker
m:MaterialTitle.description: Tap between the hour and minute label in the title bar to switch between the hour or minute view. Additionally, tap on the AM/PM label in the title bar to switch between AM or PM (in 12-hour clock mode).

m:MaterialTitle.title: Disabled Styles
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can disable your time picker by adding enabled='false'

m:MaterialTitle.title: 24 Hour format
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can set 24 hour format of time picker by adding a parameter : hour24='true'

m:MaterialTitle.title: Events
m:MaterialTitle.description: We provided events on time picker namely : Close, Open, ValueChange events.
